title: Drawing, "Hooked Rug Design: Geometric Pattern", 1930–39
medium: Brush and brown, green and black gouache, graphite on cream illustration board
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at upper margin: I think black is too strong with/red& green & tan; at left margin: Dont/like/this/[arrow]/area; at lower margin: Green should be darker & greyer more like your sample./Red should be more orange - see enclosed.; at lower right: [arrow]/this/could be red?; on verso: Aird & Watson/Textile Bldg/32nd on 5th Ave/Mr Mahoney/Colors tufts/ New England hooked rugs
description: Overlapping rectangles with cut-out corners with decorative dot pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Hooked Rug Design: Geometric Pattern", 1930–39.
1930–39. Brush and brown, green and black gouache, graphite on cream illustration board. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-44.
